name: txt.venture
description:
txt.venture is a text-based adventure game based around the themes of I S O L A T I O N and Space.

It was intended for the AGD Discord Game Jam, but due to complications, I was unable to upload it before the deadline. I was so close :'( 

It is currently a rather short demo instead of what I had planned initially, it was meant as a just a project to work on during the month of april. I wanted to focus on coding my own text adventure, basically from scratch, which is why there isn't as much story as I would have liked. I am not a proficient coder. But I did my best and I'm proud of how much I was able to get done.

I hope you'll check out my game. If you could give me any feedback, or point out typos, and bugs you may come across, that would be appreciated.

I do have plans to try and continue this, if just to practice my coding some more.
